name: UFGUnlockGiveItem
comment:
Unlock class for specifying items to give the player. Doesn't actually do anything on unlock.
More used as a container that other systems can use to find what items a schematic should give.

methods.name: GetItemsToGive
methods.comment: Returns the items that this schematic gives when unlocked

properties.name: mItemsToGive
properties.comment: The items you get from this unlock
